availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hilley M. Bedford (Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer )

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Father of Mary E Bedford, Ryland Bedford, Thomas H. Bedford, William C. Bedford, Ann R. Bedford, and Hillary Bedford. Married to Ann D Bedford. Farmer in Franklin County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Franklin County, Kentucky in 1860. Juror in E.H. Parrish ET Al to Thomas E. Bramlette in December 1864.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 168.Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 17.
